title: How to Predict Music You Love (LIVE)
excerpt: In this video, we're going to look at several different type of recommender systems in an iPython notebook. Popularity based, item-item collaborative, then user-item collaborative. Then we'll touch on the bleeding edge in deep learning at the end. Also I freestyle. Twice lol.  Code for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/recommender_live
